name: generate
shortDescription: Generates and/or modifies files based on a schematic.

options.name: defaults
options.description: Disable interactive input prompts for options with a default.

options.name: dry-run
options.description: Run through and reports activity without writing out results.

options.name: force
options.description: Force overwriting of existing files.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: interactive
options.description: Enable interactive input prompts.

options.name: schematic
options.description: The [collection:schematic] to run.

subcommands.name: app-shell
subcommands.shortDescription: Generates an application shell for running a server-side version of an app.

options.name: app-id
options.deprecated: This option is no longer used.
options.description: The application ID to use in withServerTransition().

options.name: main
options.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the related client app.

options.name: root-module-class-name
options.description: The name of the root module class.

options.name: root-module-file-name
options.description: The name of the root module file

options.name: route
options.description: Route path used to produce the application shell.

subcommands.name: application
subcommands.shortDescription: Generates a new basic application definition in the "projects" subfolder of the workspace.

options.name: inline-style
options.description: Include styles inline in the root component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. Default is false, meaning that an external styles file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

options.name: inline-template
options.description: Include template inline in the root component.ts file. Default is false, meaning that an external template file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

options.name: minimal
options.description: Create a bare-bones project without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new application.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: project-root
options.description: The root directory of the new application.

options.name: routing
options.description: Create a routing NgModule.

options.name: skip-install
options.description: Skip installing dependency packages.

options.name: skip-package-json
options.description: Do not add dependencies to the "package.json" file.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the application.

options.name: standalone
options.description: Creates an application based upon the standalone API, without NgModules.

options.name: strict
options.description: Creates an application with stricter bundle budgets settings.

options.name: style
options.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

options.name: view-encapsulation
options.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new application.

subcommands.name: class
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic class definition in the given project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new class.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

options.name: type
options.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

subcommands.name: component
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic component definition in the given project.

options.name: change-detection
options.description: The change detection strategy to use in the new component.

options.name: display-block
options.description: Specifies if the style will contain `:host { display: block; }`.

options.name: export
options.description: The declaring NgModule exports this component.

options.name: flat
options.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.

options.name: inline-style
options.description: Include styles inline in the component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

options.name: inline-template
options.description: Include template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the component.

options.name: prefix
options.description: The prefix to apply to the generated component selector.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: selector
options.description: The HTML selector to use for this component.

options.name: skip-import
options.description: Do not import this component into the owning NgModule.

options.name: skip-selector
options.description: Specifies if the component should have a selector or not.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

options.name: standalone
options.description: Whether the generated component is standalone.

options.name: style
options.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files, or 'none' to skip generating the style file.

options.name: type
options.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

options.name: view-encapsulation
options.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new component.

subcommands.name: config
subcommands.shortDescription: Generates a configuration file in the given project.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: type
options.description: Specifies which type of configuration file to create.

subcommands.name: directive
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic directive definition in the given project.

options.name: export
options.description: The declaring NgModule exports this directive.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new directive.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: selector
options.description: The HTML selector to use for this directive.

options.name: skip-import
options.description: Do not import this directive into the owning NgModule.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

options.name: standalone
options.description: Whether the generated directive is standalone.

subcommands.name: enum
subcommands.shortDescription: Generates a new, generic enum definition in the given project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the enum.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project in which to create the enum. Default is the configured default project for the workspace.

options.name: type
options.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

subcommands.name: environments
subcommands.shortDescription: Generates and configures environment files for a project.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

subcommands.name: guard
subcommands.shortDescription: Generates a new, generic route guard definition in the given project.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

options.name: functional
options.description: Specifies whether to generate a guard as a function.

options.name: implements
options.description: Specifies which type of guard to create.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new route guard.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new guard.

subcommands.name: interceptor
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic interceptor definition in the given project.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

options.name: functional
options.description: Creates the interceptor as a `HttpInterceptorFn`.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the interceptor.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new interceptor.

subcommands.name: interface
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic interface definition in the given project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the interface.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: type
options.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

subcommands.name: library
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic library project in the current workspace.

options.name: entry-file
options.description: The path at which to create the library's public API file, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the library.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: project-root
options.description: The root directory of the new library.

options.name: skip-install
options.description: Do not install dependency packages.

options.name: skip-package-json
options.description: Do not add dependencies to the "package.json" file.

options.name: skip-ts-config
options.description: Do not update "tsconfig.json" to add a path mapping for the new library. The path mapping is needed to use the library in an app, but can be disabled here to simplify development.

subcommands.name: module
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic NgModule definition in the given project.

options.name: flat
options.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project root.

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the NgModule.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: route
options.description: The route path for a lazy-loaded module. When supplied, creates a component in the new module, and adds the route to that component in the `Routes` array declared in the module provided in the `--module` option.

options.name: routing
options.description: Create a routing module.

options.name: routing-scope
options.description: The scope for the new routing module.

subcommands.name: pipe
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic pipe definition in the given project.

options.name: export
options.description: The declaring NgModule exports this pipe.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default) creates files at the top level of the project.

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the pipe.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: skip-import
options.description: Do not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

options.name: standalone
options.description: Whether the generated pipe is standalone.

subcommands.name: resolver
subcommands.shortDescription: Generates a new, generic resolver definition in the given project.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

options.name: functional
options.description: Creates the resolver as a `ResolveFn`.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new resolver.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new resolver.

subcommands.name: service
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given project.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the service.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

subcommands.name: service-worker
subcommands.shortDescription: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to create a service worker

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: target
options.description: The target to apply service worker to.

subcommands.name: web-worker
subcommands.shortDescription: Creates a new, generic web worker definition in the given project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the worker.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: snippet
options.description: Add a worker creation snippet in a sibling file of the same name.
